metric_entity.name: Pairwise F1
metric_entity.description: F1 score computed over mention pairs in the same entity cluster.

metric_entity.description: F1 score using the intersection between predicted and gold clusters for a given mention.

metric_entity.name: Unlabeled Attachment Score
metric_entity.description: Score measuring the proportion of correct syntactic dependencies without labels.
metric_entity.formula: Number of Correct Unlabeled Dependencies / Total Number of Dependencies

metric_entity.name: Labeled Attachment Score
metric_entity.description: Score measuring the proportion of correct syntactic dependencies with labels.
metric_entity.formula: Number of Correct Labeled Dependencies / Total Number of Dependencies

metric_entity.name: Cross Entropy Loss
metric_entity.description: Loss function used in neural network training to measure the difference between predicted and actual distributions.

metric_entity.name: Rand Index
metric_entity.description: Measure of the similarity between two data clusterings.
